member.name: T:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session
member.summary: A session towards the Lidl API to retrieve information from it

member.summary: Cookie container which holds all cookies for requests towards the Lidl Accounts website

member.summary: The JWT token to use to authenticate against the Lidl API

member.summary: Gets the base URI to the Lidl authentication webservice

member.summary: Gets the base URI to the Lidl data webservice

member.summary: Gets the country localized base URI to the Lidl data webservice

member.name: F:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.DefaultScopes
member.summary: The default scopes for which a token will be requested

member.name: P:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.Language
member.summary: The language for the content, formatted like NL-NL for Dutch. This can be set through the constructor.

member.name: P:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.Country
member.summary: The country to retrieve data for, formatted like NL for The Netherlands. This can be set through the constructor.

member.name: P:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.ClientId
member.summary: Client Id to provide to the Lidl Api to authenticate. This can be set through the constructor.

member.name: P:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.RedirectUri
member.summary: Redirect Uri to provide to the Lidl Api to navigate to after successfully authenticating. This can be set through the constructor.

member.name: P:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.UserAgent
member.summary: User agent to send to the Lidl Api

member.name: P:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.OperatingSystem
member.summary: Operating system identifier to send to the Lidl Api

member.name: P:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.AppVersion
member.summary: App version identifier to send to the Lidl Api

member.name: P:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.AppPackageName
member.summary: App package name to send to the Lidl Api

member.name: P:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.Scopes
member.summary: Scopes to request access to for the Lidl Api

member.name: P:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.RequestTimeOut
member.summary: Timeout to use on the HTTP requests in milliseconds

member.name: P:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.IsAuthenticated
member.summary: Returns a boolean indicating if the current session is authenticated

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Instantiates a new session to communicate with the Lidl Api
member.param: Language to retrieve the content in, i.e. NL-NL for Dutch
Country to retrieve the data for, i.e. NL for The Netherlands
Client Id to provide to the Lidl Api to authenticate
Uri to tell the Lidl Api to redirect to after successfully authenticating
User agent to send to the Lidl Api
The operating system identifier to send to the Lidl API
Internal app package name to send to the Lidl API
App version number to send to the Lidl API
Timeout to use on the HTTP requests
The scopes to request access to

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.Authenticate(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Authenticate against the Lidl Api with the provided credentials
member.param: E-mail address to authenticate with
Password to authenticate with
member.exception: Thrown if invalid credentials have been provided through and/or
Thrown if no account exists witht the provided
member.returns: Boolean indicating whether the authentication was successful (True) or failed (False)

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.Authenticate(System.String)
member.summary: Authenticate against the Lidl Api using a refresh token
member.param: Refresh token to use to retrieve an access token
member.returns: Boolean indicating whether the authentication was successful (True) or failed (False)

member.summary: Returns the available receipts
member.param: Page number to retrieve the receipts from
member.returns: instance containing all the requested receipts

member.summary: Returns details of a specific receipt
member.param: Id of the receipt to return the details for
member.returns: instance containing the requested receipt details

member.summary: Returns notification settings

member.summary: Returns alerts
member.returns: with entities containing all the alerts

member.summary: Returns alerts regarding a specific store

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.GetCoupons
member.summary: Returns coupons
member.returns: with entities containing all the coupons

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.GetLidlPlusDeal
member.summary: Returns the current Coupon Plus deal which is typically a monthly contest where depending on how much money you spend at Lidl during that month, you can get free items
member.returns: instance containing all the details on the current Lidl Plus Coupon deal

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.GetScratchCoupons
member.summary: Returns scratch coupons which are rewarded after each purchase at Lidl
member.returns: with entities containing all the available scratch coupons

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.RedeemScratchCoupon(System.String)
member.summary: Redeems/scratches open a specific scratch coupon
member.returns: Boolean indicating if the action was succesful

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.MakeReceiptFavorite(System.String)
member.summary: Marks a receipt as favorite
member.param: Id of the receipt to make favorite
member.returns: Boolean indicating if the action was succesful

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.GetStores
member.summary: Returns all the store identifiers of the stores that have been visited
member.returns: String array with store identifiers of stores that have been visited

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.GetClientConfigurationDetails(System.String)
member.summary: Returns details on the configuration of the Lidl App

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.GetAppTranslations(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the localized labels for the current language. No authenticated session required.
member.param: Language to provide the localized labels for or NULL to take the language provided in the session constructor
member.returns: Dictionary with the internal names as the key and the localized friendly text as the value

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Session.DoesEmailExist(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns if the provided e-mail address exists in the Lidl App registrations. No authenticated session required.
member.param: E-mail address to validate
The ClientId to check the e-mail address against. Leave NULL to use the ClientId used in the session constructor.
member.returns: Instance of type containing the result of the validation check

member.typeparam: Type of entity to try to parse the JSON response into

member.summary: Performs a POST request to the provided Lidl Data Endpoint to download the results as a string

member.returns: Returned JSON data as a string

member.name: T:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Utilities.Http
member.summary: Internal utility class for Http communication with the UniFi Controller

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Utilities.Http.DisableSslValidation
member.summary: Disables SSL Validation in case of self signed SSL certificates being used

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Utilities.Http.EnableTls11and12
member.summary: Enables connecting to a remote server hosting UniFi using a TLS 1.1 or TLS 1.2 certificate

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Utilities.Http.GetRequestResult(System.Uri,System.Net.CookieContainer,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Int32)
member.summary: Performs a GET request to the provided url to download the page contents
member.param: Url of the page to retrieve
Cookies which have been recorded for this session
Additional headers to add for the request
Timeout in milliseconds on how long the request may take. Default = 60000 = 60 seconds.
member.returns: Contents of the page

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Utilities.Http.PostRequestResult(System.Uri,System.Net.CookieContainer,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Int32)
member.summary: Performs a POST request to the provided url to download the page contents
member.param: Url of the page to retrieve
Cookies which have been recorded for this session
Additional headers to add for the request
Timeout in milliseconds on how long the request may take. Default = 60000 = 60 seconds.
member.returns: Contents of the page

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Utilities.Http.RequestResult(System.Uri,System.String,System.Net.CookieContainer,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Int32)
member.summary: Performs a request to the provided url to download the page contents
member.param: Url of the page to retrieve
HTTP Method to use for the request, i.e. GET or POST
Cookies which have been recorded for this session
Additional headers to add for the request
Timeout in milliseconds on how long the request may take. Default = 60000 = 60 seconds.
member.returns: Contents of the page

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Utilities.Http.RequestWebResponse(System.Uri,System.Net.CookieContainer,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Performs a GET request to the provided url
member.param: Url of the page to retrieve
The HTTP request method to use, i.e. GET/POST/PUT
Cookies which have been recorded for this session
Timeout in milliseconds on how long the request may take. Default = 60000 = 60 seconds.
member.returns: WebRequest response

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Utilities.Http.PostRequest(System.Uri,System.String,System.Net.CookieContainer,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sends a POST request towards UniFi
member.param: Url to POST the postData to
Data to send to the UniFi service, typically a JSON payload
Cookies which have been recorded for this session
Timeout in milliseconds on how long the request may take. Default = 60000 = 60 seconds.
member.returns: The website contents returned by the webserver after posting the data

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Utilities.Http.AuthenticateViaUrlEncodedFormMethod(System.Uri,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Net.CookieContainer,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sends a POST request using the url encoded form method to authenticate
member.param: Url to POST the login information to
Dictonary with key/value pairs containing the forms data to POST to the webserver
Cookies which have been recorded for this session
Timeout in milliseconds on how long the request may take. Default = 60000 = 60 seconds.
member.returns: The website contents returned by the webserver after posting the data

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Utilities.Http.AuthenticateViaJsonPostMethod(System.Uri,System.String,System.String,System.Net.CookieContainer,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sends a POST request with JSON variables to authenticate against UniFi
member.param: Url to POST the login information to
Username to authenticate with
Password to authenticate with
Cookies which have been recorded for this session
Timeout in milliseconds on how long the request may take. Default = 60000 = 60 seconds.
member.returns: The website contents returned by the webserver after posting the data

member.name: M:KoenZomers.Lidl.Api.Utilities.Http.LogoutViaJsonPostMethod(System.Uri,System.Net.CookieContainer,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sends a POST request to log out from the UniFi Controller
member.param: Url to POST the logout request to
Cookies which have been recorded for this session
Timeout in milliseconds on how long the request may take. Default = 60000 = 60 seconds.
member.returns: The website contents returned by the webserver after posting the data
